official_title: Honoring those persons whose lives have been taken by bacterial meningitis and those who continue to struggle with bacterial meningitis and its consequences, and supporting all work for the eradication of bacterial meningitis in the United States.

summary.text: Honors the people whose lives have been taken by, and those who continue to struggle with, bacterial meningitis. Expresses support for all the work for the eradication of bacterial meningitis in the United States.

titles.title: Honoring those persons whose lives have been taken by bacterial meningitis and those who continue to struggle with bacterial meningitis and its consequences, and supporting all work for the eradication of bacterial meningitis in the United States.
